title: Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless Formal Cocktail V Neck Evening
title_original: Women's Formal Dresses Long Evening Gowns Tulle V Neck Sleeveless Sparkly Sequin Cocktail Party Wedding Guest Dress

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #269,803 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #1,492 in Women's Formal Dresses

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Dresses > Formal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous dress
items.body: This dress is absolutely stunning and looks even better in person than in the photos. The floral sequins catch the light beautifully, and the flowy A-line shape is incredibly flattering. I was impressed by how comfortable it is—the fabric feels soft, breathable, and not heavy at all. The fit is elegant with a perfect high waist and a secure zipper in the back. I wore it to a formal event and received compliments all night long. This is a gorgeous, versatile dress that makes you feel confident and special the moment you put it on. Read more
items.author: cc325

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty formal/semi-formal dress
items.body: This is a very pretty dress. We had a little trouble with the zipper during the first "try on" but once clearing a rogue thread and holding down the toole it was fine. Material is slightly course and needs to be managed to open and close, so, could be of slightly higher quality to earn a 5 star but truthfully that's why I'm giving it 4. Fit is really good according to size guide. It is a bit long but nothing having it hemmed and getting some heels won't fix. Elegant and figure flattering. Appropriate for a wide age range. Dress is not overly heavy, actually light and whimsical. A good value for the price point it is offered at. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely, true color
items.body: This is a beautiful dress. I id not find anything weird with the stitching or seam alignments. The fabric looks legit and the dress has an overall classy appearance and a pleasant weight and drape of the skirt. This dress would definitely be acceptable for formal events. The size is great with the exception of being on the longer side. I don't usually run into this problem at 5'6". This dress sweeps the floor, which is pretty but presents it's own issues. It's a good dress for heels. Read more
items.author: Alissa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful.
items.body: What a beautiful dress. It's made really well. The stitching is strong and secure. The materials the dress is made from are good quality. The dress has 3 layers. Two layers of tool(and its soft) and the base dress. The dress is long. I'm 5'7 and the dress dragged on the floor without heels. I ordered a medium and I should have ordered a large. I wasnt able to zip it up fully, only half way. I guess I'm more of a size 11 and should have sized up. Accurate sizing. But that aside this dress is beautiful and worth it. Read more
items.author: Ebbs

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress, perfect for NYE
items.body: Stunning dress with beautiful sequin accents. Not for wide backs or broad shoulders. I got this in my usual size and while everything fits, the zipper will not close all the way. I am 5’9-5’10 and the dress is VERY long so it would pair nicely with some very tall heels. I love the deep cut in the front or the bodice but it is still classy because there is still sheer fabric over the cut. Just a gorgeous dress. I can’t comment to its comfort as I am not able to use it since it does not zip up all the way unfortunately. I was going to use this for an NYE party. Let’s see if I can drop some more weight by then. Haha! It’s gorgeous. Thanks for reading. Read more
items.author: Cinny Reviews

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning Design - True To Size
items.body: My daughter loves this gorgeous blue dress. At 5'1" she wears a size small perfectly, and the design is truly stunning—delicate details, lightweight fabric, and a flattering cut make it a standout piece. The fabric feels comfortable and the color is vibrant; overall it’s a perfect find for her high school dance, and it's an excellent value. Read more
items.author: Wayne

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun formal
items.body: The dress fits perfectly (true to size) and looks great (Just like the photo). Other than having to have it hemmed (short girl problems) I won't need any other alterations. I have several wedding to attend in 2026 and it will be fun to wear this dress to one or more of the events. The empire waist is so flattering and the tulle over satin skirt flows nicely as you walk. The shimmering top print and neckline are frisky yet modest, a lovely combination. While no one is going to mistake this for a high end designer gown, have some serious fun because you didn't need a loan and you look marvelous. Read more
items.author: dontnodip

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress that looks and feels great
items.body: Stunning dress that looks and feels like a much more expensive dress. I love the way it fits and flows and the color is even nicer in person than how it looks online. It makes a perfect dress for evening events, weddings or even those fancier holiday parties as the shine and shimmer give it an extra sparkly look. Read more
items.author: HS

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless Formal Cocktail V Neck Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless Formal Cocktail V Neck Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Dusty Sage, Fuchsia, Dusty Pink, Black, Champagne, Peacock, Blush Pink, Dusty_blue, Emerald, Aqua Blue, Royal Blue, Mauve, Gold. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
